alert.note: Alert for Glades (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Glades County through 545 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Venus to near Brighton Seminole Reservation. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buckhead Ridge, Brighton Seminole Reservation and Okee Tantie Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
